title: Welcome to astro-i18n-plus
description: Astro-i18n plus is an international plugin that automates basic operations without the need for manual page management or interference with your src directory.

cards.title: Minimal configuration
cards.subtitle: There are no additional configurations, you just need to focus on your own business and not worry about translation issues.

cards.title: Automatically load language files
cards.subtitle: Drop *. json in public/locales/ to automatically load the language list

cards.title: No need to maintain multiple template pages
cards.subtitle: Automatic maintenance of multilingual templates

cards.title: Not polluting the project
cards.subtitle: In the past, internationalized components would generate multiple sets of templates under src, which seemed uncomfortable
